document_name: Approval of Community Project by PDC Jan 2009 (2).pd Revisedf.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/SDN/00056843/Approval of Community Project by PDC Jan 2009 (2).pd Revisedf.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
- Project Management and operational costs, including procurement and Project staff commenced.
- Community Policing structure at state level established.
- Capacity Development , Training& Awareness Raising.
- Establishment of Local Safety Working Groups & Development of Community Safety Plans.
- Functional Community Safety Centers and Equipment of Community Policing Officers.
- Project Monitoring, Evaluation and Documentation of lessons learned.

project_descr: The Community Policing Project is intended to support national authorities in elaborating a national framework on community-based policing that provides for an accountable and closer working partnership between the civilian police and the communities.
